<title level="1" right="Rules">[Feats](/Rules.aspx?ID=1541)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 219 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
This section presents new feats that are available only to creatures or characters from pervasive magic campaigns. All of these feats are class feats, but they can be taken by any class. When you take the feat, it gains the trait appropriate for your class.

[Cantrip Casting](/Feats.aspx?ID=3005), [Basic Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=3006), [Expert Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=3007), [Master Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=3008) 
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
